This is a rendering of hmtl files from the course repository  (https://github.com/jeffreyblanchard/EvoGeno2024R) for Human Genome Analysis taught at the University of Massachusetts Amherst by Prof. Jeffrey Blanchard.  If you are not using RStudio (Posit) Cloud here are [EvoGeno_github.html) for creating a RStudio project space that is in sync with the course github and will download the files in the course repo.

* Lab 1 : [Introduction to R and Reproducible Research](EvoGeno_Lab1_intro.html)
* Lab 2 : [Rmarkdown](EvoGeno_Lab2_Rmarkdown.html)
* Lab 3 : [Data types and importing tables](EvoGeno_Lab3_data_types.html)

Advanced Labs

* Lab xtra1 : [Programming in R - Regular Expressions](EvoGeno_xtra1_stringr.html)
